name: Child Circle
goal:
CHILD CIRCLE is a Brussels based non-profit organisation which promotes and supports the strengthening of child protection systems in Europe.

CHILD CIRCLE promotes European action which strengthens national systems to protect children from violence, abuse, neglect and exploitation. ​

​We advocate for European action which enhances child participation and the ways in which professionals work together to protect children.

CHILD CIRCLE contributes to policy and law developments at EU level, connects child protection advocates through a knowledge exchange and collaborates with stakeholders on practical projects.
interests: Budget, Employment and Social Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives: EU Justice and Home Affairs, including children's rights and child protection
